entries.content: Focus on figuring out the reasons why the deal can't happen or why it's not going to work.
entries.notes: Shift from positive selling to identifying potential blockers.

entries.content: Identify the main reasons why people historically don't buy from you by looking for patterns or themes.
entries.notes: Finding the common root causes of past failures.

entries.content: Start using those identified common objections at the beginning of your meetings.
Can I tell you the three reasons why we're probably not going to work together even if you want to?
entries.notes: Specific phrase to introduce potential objections early.

entries.content: When you state potential reasons for not working together, the prospect will either confirm they apply or argue against them.
entries.notes: This process isolates whether the stated objections are real or not.

entries.content: If the prospect argues against the stated reasons, challenge them with 'well why not' to uncover their justification or the actual situation.
entries.notes: Using clarifying questions to get to the root cause if the initial stated objections are incorrect.

focus_area: Objection Discovery: Clarifying questions, isolation, root cause
